lose.name: Fruit Shake
lose.recipe: Put all the chosen fruit in the mixer, unitl you have a liquid fruit shake, that as low calories and a good taste
lose.macro-review: Some carbs, represented by natural sugar, a lot of vitamin

lose.name: Avocado and smoked salmon toasts
lose.recipe: Put the avocado on the toast, and then the smocked salmon. If you really want to lose fat, don't put too much avocado
lose.macro-review: A few carbs, represented by bread, and a lot of protein, represented by avocado and salmon

main.name: Banana milk
main.recipe: Cut the banana in small slice, and then put it with cereals in the milk
main.macro-review: Carbs represented by cereals and banana, and the good fat and the protein of the milk. Totaly healthy

main.name: Proteic pancake
main.recipe: After mounting the albums to snow, add the flour oats and yogurt mixing. cook in one non-stick pan
main.macro-review: High in protein, only a few of carbs

gain.name: Greek jougurt with nuts
gain.ingredient: Greek jougurt and nuts, but also every type of dried fruit. If you want, add also some berries
gain.recipe: Put the nuts in the jougurt, and shake a bit
gain.macro-review: Preatty rich in carbs, due of the nuts, but also in protein

gain.name: Coconut coffee shake
gain.recipe: Put the coffe and the milk in the same glass, and shake. Then add the sugar, the coconut. Add also other dried fruit if you want
gain.macro-review: High in carbs, but also with an high protein due of the presence of the milk.

lose.name: Zucchini spaghetti with tomato
lose.recipe: Create the spaghetti using a spiralizator, then put the tomato sauce, and let it cooks for some minute
lose.macro-review: Rich in vitamin, rich in fiber, no carbs, only a few of protein

lose.name: Mediterranean salad
lose.recipe: Boil the egg, cut lettuce and tomato, then put all the ingredients in the same recipe
lose.macro-review: Good amount of protein, due of the egg, no carbs, good amount of vitamin and fiber

main.name: Pasta genovese
main.ingredient: Pasta (100g per person), pesto, potatos, basil
main.recipe: Cook the pasta normally, cut in very small pieces the potatos, and then put them with the pesto. When the pasta is coocked, put everithing toghether
main.macro-review: Good carbs amount, high in fiber, has also deoxindants

main.name: Chicken salad
main.ingredient: Chicken, lettuce, a choosen sauce, better if light
main.recipe: Cut the chicken in small pieces, asnd then cook it. Put the coocked chicken on lettuce leaf with the sauce. You can eat now, or make a wrap with another lettuce leaf
main.macro-review: No carbs, high protein, good amount of fiber

gain.name: Basmati rice with scrambled egg
gain.recipe: Cook the rice and make scrambled eggs. Then destroy the egg, and put everything toghether. It would be delicius and healthy

gain.name: Potatoes and chicken
gain.recipe: Grill the chicken, and backes potatoes. Choose the same amount of chicken and potatoes
gain.macro-review: High both in carbs and in protein. Has also a few of good fat. Exelent for gain weight

lose.name: Salmon salad
lose.recipe: Cut tomato and lettuce as you prefer. You can choose if you want to cook salmon. Then, put everything toghether
lose.macro-review: High in fiber, with a good amount of protein

lose.name: Cuscus
lose.recipe: Prepare the cuscus following steps in the container, cut the carrots. When everything is ready, melt everithing toghether
lose.macro-review: High in carbs, but also in fiber and vitamin

main.name: Fish spaghetti
main.recipe: Cook the spaghetti and the shrimps in different pots, then melt everithing. If you want, add basil or some spicies
main.macro-review: Good amount of carbs and protein, with also fiber

main.name: Rich sandwick
main.ingredient: Bread, lettuce, tomatoes, chicken meat stripes
main.recipe: Cook the chicken meat stripes. Then put all the ingredients in the bread. Enjoy
main.macro-review: Low carbs, good in protein, fiber and vitamin

gain.name: Friulan frico
gain.recipe: Cut in small peaces the potatoes, then melt the cheese in the same pan of the potatoes, until it grills a bit
gain.macro-review: Good amount of fat and protein

gain.name: Pork potatoes
gain.ingredient: Pork chop, potatoes, carrots and barbecue sauce
gain.recipe: Cook the pork chop. Cut and cook both potatoes and carrots. Put everything toghether, and add the barbecue sauce

lose.name: Berries jougurt
lose.recipe: Put the berries in the same cup with the greek jougurt. That is all
lose.macro-review: Good amount of protein and vitamin

lose.name: Fruit salad
lose.recipe: After choosing the fruit, cut it and put everithing in a bowl. If you want, add some lemon juice
lose.macro-review: Carbs, represented by good frui sugar. High in vitamin and fiber

main.name: Salmon burger small
main.recipe: Put the salmon beetwen the two half of the bread. Don't choose an enormus bread

main.name: Banana and strawberries shake
main.recipe: Put everything in the mixer, until is a liquid uniform delicius meal
main.macro-review: High in vitaimn, carbs, and with a few of good fat

gain.name: Avocato toast
gain.recipe: Put the content of the avocato on the toast bread
gain.macro-review: High in protein, with some carbs

gain.name: Sweet jougurt with nuts
gain.ingredient: Honey, white jougurt, nuts or dried fruit
gain.recipe: Put the honey in the jougurt. Mix it, and then add nuts
gain.macro-review: High in carbs, protein, and with a few of good fat
